top_comments.comment:
ഇടുക്കികാരുടെ സ്വന്തം ഏലം.
മലയോര മേഖലയിലെ കാർഷിക സാമ്പത്തിക വ്യവസ്ഥയുടെ നട്ടെല്ല്. ❣️

Cardamom smells delightful. Their mastery is worth the money.
Sitting here as a desi and wondering why white people are now 'discovering' spices we grew up with 🤣

I love green cardamoms, they just add beautiful aroma to many Indian dishes & masala chai is nothing without them, currently as winters approaching, I drink masala chai literally everyday ❤️
P.S yes due to climate crisis the farmers are most affected, & the spice is become unexpectedly costly, I remember last year it’s 4000 bucks for 1Kg 🥲
Does the lady not know what profits mean? Since he's using the money for fertilizer that's not going to be part of the profit.
Its not expensive because its used in  cheapest foods in poorest countries in the world.
